name: MISTC
short_description: MISTC is a powerful and robust Internet teaching and conferencing environment based on open-source Internet conferencing software. MISTC works with the learning management system   to handle the database and file requirements for courses and conferences. MISTC is a suite of open-source distance education software, which is highly modular and makes efficient use of both network bandwidth and human time. MISTC is easy to adapt for a wide variety of distance education and conferencing uses.
